name: SuperTux Advance - Beta web version port
name_original: SuperTux Advance - Beta web version port
description:
Controls:

  • Move: arrow keys
  • Jump: Z
  • Shoot: X
  • Run: left shift
  • Item swap: A
  • Pause: Esc

A port of SuperTux Advance so that it can run in a web browser! Note that I'm not the author of SuperTux Advance; I simply ported the codebase to javascript and a browser environment.

SuperTux Advance: https://github.com/KelvinShadewing/supertux-advance

Web version port: https://github.com/dtsudo/WorkInProgress-SuperTux-Advance-Web-Version-Port
